activities:
We collect some basic information only.
- Unique person identifier 
- Name
- email (possible future item that could be used as a unique identifier)
- viewing statistics of content resident in the EchoSystem (but not public internet viewing statistics)
- School affiliation
- course/term/section of courses taken by the individual
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client and customer data. Some manually processed data
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
